gagga manwjan stad izwis.
JOHN 14.3 jah þan jabai gagga, manwja izwis stad,
aftra qima jah franima izwis du mis silbin, ei þarei im ik, þaruh sijuþ jah jus.
JOHN 14.4 jah þadei ik gagga kunnuþ jah þana wig kunnuþ.
JOHN 14.5 þaruh qaþ imma Þomas:
frauja, ni witum ƕaþ gaggis, jah ƕaiwa magum þana wig kunnan?
JOHN 14.6 qaþ imma Iesus:
ik im sa wigs jah sunja jah libains.
ainshun ni qimiþ at attin, niba þairh mik.
JOHN 14.7 iþ kunþedeiþ mik, aiþþau kunþedeiþ jah attan meinana;
jah þan fram himma kunnuþ ina jah gasaiƕiþ ina.
JOHN 14.8 iþ Filippus qaþuh du imma:
frauja, augei unsis þana attan;
þatuh ganah unsis.
JOHN 14.9 þaruh qaþ imma Iesus:
swalaud melis miþ izwis was, jah ni ufkunþes mik, Filippu?
saei gasaƕ mik, gasaƕ attan,
jah ƕaiwa þu qiþis:
augei unsis þana attan?
JOHN 14.10 niu galaubeis þatei ik in attin jah atta in mis ist?
þo waurda þoei ik rodja izwis, af mis silbin ni rodja, ak atta saei in mis ist, sa taujiþ þo waurstwa.
JOHN 14.11 Galaubeiþ mis þatei ik in attin jah atta in mis;
iþ jabai ni, in þize waurstwe galaubeiþ mis.
JOHN 14.12 amen amen qiþa izwis,
saei galaubeid mis: þo waurstwa þoei ik tauja, jah is taujiþ jah maizona þaim taujiþ;
unte ik du attin gagga.
JOHN 14.13 jah þatei ƕa bidjiþ in namin meinamma, þata tauja, ei hauhjaidau atta in sunau.
JOHN 14.14 jabai ƕis bidjiþ mik in namin meinamma, ik tauja.
JOHN 14.15 jabai mik frijoþ, anabusnins meinos fastaid.
JOHN 14.16 jah ik bidja attan, jah anþarana parakletu gibiþ izwis, ei sijai miþ izwis du aiwa, JOHN 14.17 ahma sunjos, þanei so manaseiþs ni mag niman, unte ni saiƕiþ ina, nih kann ina;
iþ jus kunnuþ ina, unte is miþ izwis wisiþ jah in izwis ist.
JOHN 14.18 ni leta izwis widuwairnans;
qima at izwis.
JOHN 14.19 nauh leitil, jah so manaseiþs mik ni þanaseiþs saiƕiþ;
iþ jus saiƕiþ mik, þatei ik liba, jah jus libaiþ.
JOHN 14.20 in jainamma daga ufkunnaiþ jus þatei ik in attin meinamma jah jus in mis jah ik in izwis.
JOHN 14.21 Saei habaid anabusnins meinos jah fastaiþ þos, sa ist saei frijoþ mik:
jah þan saei frijoþ mik, frijoda fram attin meinamma, jah ik frijo ina jah gabairhtja imma mik silban.
JOHN 14.22 þaruh qaþ imma Iudas, ni sa Iskarjotes:
frauja, ƕa warþ, ei unsis munais gabairhtjan þuk silban, iþ þizai manasedai ni?
JOHN 14.23 andhof Iesus jah qaþ du imma:
jabai ƕas mik frijoþ, waurd mein fastaiþ, jah atta meins frijoþ ina, jah du imma galeiþos jah saliþwos at imma gataujos.
JOHN 14.24 iþ saei ni frioþ mik, þo waurda meina ni fastaiþ;
jah þata waurd þatei hauseiþ nist mein, ak þis sandjandins mik attins.
JOHN 14.25 þata rodida izwis at izwis wisands.
JOHN 14.26 aþþan sa parakletus, ahma sa weiha, þanei sandeiþ atta in namin meinamma, sa izwis laiseiþ allata jah gamaudeiþ izwis allis þatei qaþ du izwis.
JOHN 14.27 gawairþi bileiþa izwis,
gawairþi mein giba izwis;
ni swaswe so manaseþs gibiþ, ik giba izwis.
ni indrobnaina izwara hairtona nih faurhtjaina.
JOHN 14.28 Hausideduþ ei ik qaþ izwis:
galeiþa jah qima at izwis;
jabai frijodedeiþ mik, aiþþau jus faginodedeiþ ei ik gagga du attin:
unte atta meins maiza mis ist.
JOHN 14.29 jah nu qaþ izwis, faurþizei waurþi, ei biþe wairþai, galaubjaiþ.
JOHN 14.30 þanaseiþs filu ni maþlja miþ izwis;
qimiþ saei þizai manasedai reikinoþ, jah in mis ni bigitiþ waiht.
JOHN 14.31 ak ei ufkunnai so manaseþs þatei ik frijoda attan meinana, jah swaswe anabaud mis atta, swa tauja.
urreisiþ,
gaggam þaþro.
JOHN 15.1 Ik im weinatriu þata sunjeino, jah atta meins waurstwja ist.
JOHN 15.2 all taine in mis unbairandane akran goþ, usnimiþ ita:
jah all akran bairandane, gahraineiþ ita, ei managizo akran bairaina.
